alert.note: Alert for Richland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:55PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Wibaux and southeastern Richland Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 355 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sidney, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Savage, Midway, Wooley and Crane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
